comments: Number of edges of the complete bipartite graph of order 8n, K_n,7n - _Roberto E. Martinez II_, Jan 07 2002Number of edges of the complete tripartite graph of order 5n, K_n,n,3n - _Roberto E. Martinez II_, Jan 07 2002
formula: Central terms of the triangle in A132111: a(n) = A132111(2*n, n). - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Aug 10 2007a(n) = 7 * A000290(n). [_Omar E. Pol_, Dec 11 2008]a(n) = 14*n + a(n-1) - 7 (with a(0) = 0). [_Vincenzo Librandi_, Aug 05 2010]
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
